title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs with grated Pecorino cheese and black pepper.
Drain the spaghetti and toss with bacon and the egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, garlic, and spices for 30 minutes.
Grill the chicken pieces until cooked.
Cook onions, garlic, and spices in butter until fragrant.
Add tomato puree and cream, and simmer with the grilled chicken.
